description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Game Over when an enemy finds you.This game is very difficult. Get to the top floor through the traps and enemies sight! Get the fastest clear time! You can practice floors you've reached in "Floor training" mode.
